title: Job Hunter Actor
description: Finds job listings from the web based on keywords and location.

keywords.title: Job Keywords
keywords.description: Enter keywords to search for jobs (e.g. Software Engineer, Data Analyst).

location.title: Job Location
location.description: Enter the location for job search (e.g. New York, Remote, India).

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape.

includeDescription.title: Include Job Descriptions
includeDescription.description: Whether to include full job descriptions in results.
